data.partBlankContent: We recently searched for a new employee for our business. We we__ looking f__ someone w__ was profes______, y__ also f__ to wo__ with. The per___ had t_ have go__ communication ski___, a__ also t__ ability t_ do ma__ tasks. We were prepared to pay a lot for the right person.
data.fullContent: We recently searched for a new employee for our business. We were looking for someone who was professional, yet also fun to work with. The person had to have good communication skills, and also the ability to do many tasks. We were prepared to pay a lot for the right person.
data.answer: 我们最近为公司寻找一位新员工。我们要找的是专业的，同时也很有趣的合作伙伴。这个人必须有良好的沟通技巧，也有能力完成许多任务。我们准备为合适的人出高薪。
